text: Didier-Léon Marchard (1 November 1925 – 16 February 2022) was a French Roman Catholic bishop. He became a priest in 1951. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Valence, France from 1978 until his retirement in 2001. Marchand died on 16 February 2022, at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2022 deaths Category:French Roman Catholic bishops
title: Didier-Léon Marchand
